body:
On a clean `develop` checkout : 

```
$ git clone https://github.com/LLNL/spack.git

$ cd spack
$ . share/spack/setup-env.sh 
$ spack compilers

-- gcc ----------------------------------------------------------
gcc@4.8

$ spack install zlib
==> Installing zlib

==> 0 installed packages.

$ spack install szip

$ spack find
```
